scenario_text.value: (Neither Takuma nor the others blame me...)

(Still, I...I won’t forgive myself. No, it’s
more like I can’t.)
(After all... When it happened, I...)
There you are.
Oh! Kaito...!

You came after me too, then? Sorry, but right
now I...

I didn’t come after you.
I just happened to be here.
I just...wanted to be by myself, too.
You too...?

About Saki, see... The thing you regret the
most, the thing you can’t forgive the most...
I get the feeling I understand all that.
Wha’... What do you mean?
(Did he notice it? Saki’s hand, I...)

The moment she was swallowed by the fog,
Saki—

Stop! Don’t say it! You don’t have to tell
me, I already know!

I let go of Saki’s hand! That was my fault!
That’s why she died!

(Exactly! That’s why I’m to blame! I let her
die!)
No! That’s not true!
What’s not true?!

Saki, she...she’s the one that let go, not
you! She didn’t want us to get caught up!
That was her choice, and her choice alone!

It can’t be... I mean, Saki wanted to live
most of all.

(That’s right... She wanted to live... Live,
and overcome her illness...)

(The Saki I know wouldn’t have thrown her
life away!)

That’s impossible... She wanted to live more
than any of us...
And yet, I...I let go first!

I should’ve held on, no matter what happened
to me, and yet I...!
You’re wrong! Look back and really remember!

Saki protected you! You gotta accept that
fact!

That’s just a convenient excuse for
a survivor!

So what if the tables were turned? What would
you do if you’d been in her shoes?!

You probably would’ve let go yourself, just
like Saki did!

So you’re telling me to accept her death as
unavoidable?!

I kuh... I can’t... I could never do that...
*sniff*

I get it... I get that much. If something
like that had happened to Miu, I’d...

But don’t you understand Saki’s feelings?!
She wanted to protect you, no matter what!

If I got put in a situation like Saki’s, and
I thought Miu might get caught up in it...

I’d make sure I protected her... Even if it
meant knocking her away. Even if I died!

Even if it made Miu cry... Even if she came
to hate me. No contest.

(I see... I imagine Kaito would do a fine job
protecting Miu.)

(No matter what happened... No matter what it
cost him, he would save her.)
(Yet I...couldn’t do that.)

I couldn’t do anything... Nothing, nothing at
all!

Neither could I... I feel like shit ’cuz of
how useless I was back there!

Even so, we’re here! We’re alive! That’s why
we’ve gotta make it through this!
Oh, Aoi! I finally found you!
You’re here too, Kaito...?

Why?! Why did it have to be Saki...? Why
couldn’t it have been me?!
Whyyyyyy?! Unnngh... Uwahhhhhh...!
Wha’... Aoi...?
My bad... Looks like I pushed her too far.
*sniff* Unnngh... Saki... Saki!

Aoi... I hate seeing you cry like this... It
feels like there’s a vice in my chest...

(Saki... I’m sorry... I’m sorry! I’m
sorry!!!)
